text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern und folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiü zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Ccena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR> <PRIZE>das Eremplar in albo achthalben bz.</PRIZE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR> <PRIZE>10. Batzen, und auff Schreib-papier 14. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE><YEAR>1713</YEAR> <PRIZE>8 Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Carechetischer Leübachter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebatt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR> <PRIZE>mit dem Kupffer-Btatt haltet 15. und ein halben Bogen, 5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Rein,</PLACE> <PRIZE>15. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegrundete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR><PRIZE>gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Pfalms 9. 1. 5. Batzen.</PRIZE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":8,"explanation":"The XML was missing closing tags for year, prize and also had issues with character encodings. I have added the missing tags and fixed the character encodings."}

parsed.explanation: The XML was missing closing tags for year, prize and also had issues with character encodings. I have added the missing tags and fixed the character encodings.
